sentence.value: He was selected as a cosmonaut on December 1, 1978 and flew as Flight Engineer on Soyuz T-10 and Soyuz T-15, spending a total of 361 days, 22 hours, 49 minutes in space.
sentence.tree: nsubjpass(selected/VBN-3,He/PRP-1) nsubjpass(flew/VBD-13,He/PRP-1) auxpass(selected/VBN-3,was/VBD-2) det(cosmonaut/NN-6,a/DT-5) prep_as(selected/VBN-3,cosmonaut/NN-6) prep_on(cosmonaut/NN-6,December/NNP-8) num(December/NNP-8,1/CD-9) num(December/NNP-8,1978/CD-11) conj_and(selected/VBN-3,flew/VBD-13) nn(Engineer/NNP-16,Flight/NNP-15) prep_as(flew/VBD-13,Engineer/NNP-16) nn(T-10/NNP-19,Soyuz/NNP-18) prep_on(Engineer/NNP-16,T-10/NNP-19) nn(T-15/NNP-22,Soyuz/NNP-21) prep_on(Engineer/NNP-16,T-15/NNP-22) conj_and(T-10/NNP-19,T-15/NNP-22) partmod(Engineer/NNP-16,spending/VBG-24) det(total/NN-26,a/DT-25) dobj(spending/VBG-24,total/NN-26) num(days/NNS-29,361/CD-28) prep_of(total/NN-26,days/NNS-29) num(hours/NNS-32,22/CD-31) appos(days/NNS-29,hours/NNS-32) num(minutes/NNS-35,49/CD-34) tmod(flew/VBD-13,minutes/NNS-35) prep_in(flew/VBD-13,space/NN-37)

sentence.value: The crew spent ten months (nearly 237 days) performing numerous medical and space manufacturing experiments.
sentence.annotated-sentence: The crew spent ten [[months|Month]] (nearly 237 days) performing numerous medical and [[space|Space_manufacturing]][[space manufacturing|Space_manufacturing]] [[experiments|Experiment]].

sentence.value: Solovyov's second flight was aboard Soyuz T-15, taking off on March 13, 1986 and coming back aboard the same craft on July 16, 1986, 125 days later.

sentence.value: During the T-15 mission, the crew transferred equipment from Salyut-7 to the new Mir space station; they were the last aboard the former and the first aboard the latter.
